price: 41. Rabbigayow! Ii denbi dhaaf aniga iyo labadeyda waalid iyo mu’miniintaba Maalinta ay dhici Xisaabtu (Qiyaamadu).
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
